name: NewYorkCitySchoolCalendar
0:
”Alexa, open new york city”
”Alexa, start new york city”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new york city
des: New York City public school system is in the state of New York. Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming NYC school calendar. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
